page.title: 09Mangrove Hall Farm cont.
page.content: rack,and one fertilizer.He only has one person to help him, and that is his son. This is a typical day on Mr.Andrew's farm.He gets up at 7am.and feeds the animals, mucks out the horses and then has breakfast.Next he does his combining, sowing seeds or crop spraying or ploughing, depending upon the time of the year. At 1pm. he has dinner.If it's a nice day, he has a packed lunch in the fields.After this, he finishes what he started in the morning.At dusk, he goes back to the farmhouse and does any paper work. He has to fill in lots of forms for the Ministry of Agriculture.Then he watches television.He owns a Mercedes diesel-powered car,a television and a video.This year he is going to Portugal for his holiday.
